quoteText: We do not use any third parties in the website, but we may use it to have your host in another country, if so it tells it if you hover. No third parties gets your data.
title: The service does not share user information with third parties

tosdr.case: The service does not share user information with third parties
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy tells that none of your info is shared, and the website does not use third-parties.
